abstract: Defensive end Aldon Smith signs with Oakland Raiders after being cut by San Francisco 49ers; other professional football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Oakland Raiders signed the troubled pass rusher Aldon Smith to a contract, five weeks after the San Francisco 49ers cut him.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Raiders Sign Ex-49er

snippet: The Oakland Raiders signed the troubled pass rusher Aldon Smith to a contract, five weeks after the San Francisco 49ers cut him.
